testimonial: I love Communal. It made moving in with a dog much easier.

Communal helped me get milk for my coffee.
My community started sharing gardening tools instead of everyone buying their own.
I have realized that I have a lot in common with my neighbors.
I borrowed some chairs for a party from a neighbor in the building across, and now we are looking for an apartment together.
My mom is always worried when the news says something bad about Copenhagen. Now she uses my Communal account to check that nothing is wrong in my area.
